items.name: Ocarina Sauvignon Blanc (Chile)
items.description: Juicy tropical notes are well balanced with a refreshing kick of acidity.

items.name: Marqués de Alfamen Chardonnay (Spain)
items.description: Fresh, light white wine with lots of juicy melon and pineapple fruit.

items.name: Ponte Pinot Grigio (Italy)
items.description: Very light and neutral, revealing just a hint of green fruit.

items.name: Inviniti Sauvignon Blanc (New Zealand)
items.description: This Marlborough Sauvignon is passionfruit and citrus-driven. Crisp and refreshing with lime character and a juicy flavour.

items.name: Ponte Pinot Grigio Rosé (Italy)
items.description: A fresh and youthful off-dry wine that has a lovely rose petal pink colour.

items.name: Canyon Road White Zinfandel (USA)
items.description: Light-bodied with hints of strawberry, cherry flavours, watermelon and a crisp, smooth finish.

items.name: Ocarina Merlot (Chile)
items.description: Lovely juicy plum fruit character, which shows hints of spice on the smooth finish.

items.name: Malbec (Argentina)
items.description: A mid-bodied and warming red wine that has a good attack of damson and spice aromas.

items.name: Medievo Rioja Reserva (Spain)
items.description: Aroma of prune, leather and vanilla, complex and well balanced in mouth due to its well polished tannins.

items.name: Vitti Primitivo (Italy)
items.description: An impressively intense and complex full bodied red, full of liquorice, tar and dark fruit.

items.name: Zimor Prosecco (Italy)
items.description: Intensely sparkling with light, fresh, appley aromas. Not too dry on the palate.
